Brad Westmoreland
=================

Brad Westmoreland, City Council Member - Position 3
---------------------------------------------------

![Brad 2](https://www.baycitytx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1838)[Email: bwestmoreland@cityofbaycity.org](mailto:bwestmoreland@cityofbaycity.org)

Councilman Westmoreland was sworn in July 2021
